quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
quotes.author: Estée Lauder

quotes.quote: Difficulties in your life do not come to destroy you but to help you realise your hidden potential and power. Let difficulties know that you too are difficult.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: When we close ourselves off, we're not just closing ourselves off to other people, we're closing ourselves off from ourselves and impeding ourselves. When you open up, you allow yourself to be who you are.
quotes.author: Amy Cuddy

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: You can’t give up! When you give up, you're like everybody else!
quotes.author: Chris Evert

quotes.quote: He can who thinks he can, and he can't who thinks he can't. This is an inexorable, indisputable law.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: There is nothing more powerful in the world than the idea that came in time.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo
